meanings.definition: Experiencing a prickling or stinging sensation.
meanings.sent1: The cold wind made my skin feel tingly.
meanings.sent2: After sitting for a long time, my foot became tingly.
meanings.sent3: The tickling feather left a tingly feeling on my arm.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of the surprise gift made her heart feel tingly.
meanings.sent5: The fizzy soda left a tingly sensation on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: The minty toothpaste gave a tingly freshness to my breath.
meanings.sent2: The massage oil had a tingly effect on my sore muscles.
meanings.sent3: The spicy salsa left a tingly sensation on my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The exciting news sent a tingly feeling down her spine.
meanings.sent5: The electric shock from the socket left a tingly feeling in my hand.
